# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="08445-102">Instrukcje: usuwanie utworzonych automatycznie kolumn z kontrolki DataGridView formularzy systemu Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="08445-103">Gdy Twoja <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> kontrolki jest ustawiona na automatyczne generowanie kolumn na podstawie danych ze źródła danych, można selektywnie pominąć niektóre kolumny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="08445-104">Można to zrobić, wywołując <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metody <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekcji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="08445-105">Alternatywnie można ukryć kolumny w widoku, ustawiając <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> właściwość `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="08445-106">Ta technika jest przydatna, gdy chcesz wyświetlić ukryte kolumny w niektórych sytuacjach, lub gdy potrzebujesz dostępu do danych w kolumnach bez wyświetlania go.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="08445-107">Aby usunąć utworzonych automatycznie kolumn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="08445-108">Wywołaj <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metody <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekcji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="08445-109">Aby ukryć utworzonych automatycznie kolumn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="08445-110">W kolumnie ustaw <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> właściwość `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="08445-112">Kompilowanie kodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="08445-113">Ten przykład wymaga:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="08445-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> formantu o nazwie `dataGridView1` powiązana z tabelą zawierającą `Fax` i `CustomerID` kolumn, takich jak `Customers` tabeli w bazie danych Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="08445-115">Odwołuje się do <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> i <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> zestawów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="08445-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
